text: Opuntia chaffeyi is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Zacatecas state in Mexico. Its natural habitat is hot deserts. It is a Critically endangered species, threatened by habitat loss. ==References== chaffeyi Category:Cacti of Mexico Category:Endemic flora of Mexico Category:Flora of Zacatecas Category:Critically endangered biota of Mexico Category:Critically endangered flora of North America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Opuntia chaffeyi
